body:
Just a special little post i made, in celebration of a milestone i - for a long time - would NEVER have happened: 10,000 kills!
I'm heaps happy and grateful to do in on such a nice server, so imma make an AMA for it :)

Ask me ANYTHING...
body_tagged:

Ask me ANYTHING...
title: 10,000 Kills!! AMA
